src:
Jadwal Bola Sabtu: Liga 1, Liga Inggris, Liga Spanyol, Serie A
01 Nov 2019, 22:53 by Terjemahan, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Jadwal bola pada Sabtu hingga Ahad dinihari nanti, 3 November 2019, akan menyajikan rangkaian pertandingan dari arena Liga 1 Indonesia, Liga Inggris, Liga Spanyol, dan Liga Italia.
Simak ringkasannya:

Liga 1

Liga 1 Indonesia akan menyajikan tiga pertandingan yang merupakan rangkaian jadwal pekan ke-26.15:30 PSIS Semarang vs PSS Sleman (Indosiar)18:30 Bhayangkara FC vs Semen Padang18:30 Persebaya vs PSM Makassar (Ditunda).

Liga Inggris

Jadwal Liga Inggris pekan ke-11 pada malam nanti akan menyajikan banyak aksi menarik. Manchester United, Arsenal, Liverpool, dan Chelsea akan berlaga.Bournemouth vs Manchester United | 19:30 WIB Arsenal vs Wolves | 22:00 WIB Aston Villa vs Liverpool | 22:00 WIB (TVRI)Brighton vs Norwich | 22:00 WIB Manchester City vs Southampton | 22:00 WIB Sheffield vs Burnley | 22:00 WIB West Ham vs Newcastle | 22:00 WIB Watford vs Chelsea | 00:30 WIB (Ahad dinihari).

Liga Spanyol

Tiga klub besar La Liga, Barcelona, Real Madrid, dan Atletico Madrid, akan sama-sama berlaga dalam jadwal pekan ke-12 malam nanti. Espanyol vs Valencia | 19:00 WIBLevante vs Barcelona | 22:00 WIBSevilla vs Atletico Madrid | 00:30 WIBReal Madrid vs Real Betis | 03:00 WIB.

Liga Italia

Persaingan Juventus dan Inter Milan akan kembali berlangsung malam ini. Keduanya berpacu saat menjalani jadwal pekan ke-11 Serie A.AS Roma vs Napoli | 21:00 WIBBologna vs Inter Milan | 00:00 WIBTorino vs Juventus | 02:45 WIB.
text:
Saturday Soccer Schedule: League 1, English League, Spanish League, Serie A
01 Nov 2019, 22:53 by translations, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The soccer schedule from Saturday to Sunday morning, 3 November 2019, will present a series of matches from the Indonesian League 1, English League, Spanish League and Italian League arena.
Check out the summary:

League 1

Indonesian League 1 will present three matches which are the 26th week of the week schedule: 15: 30 PSIS Semarang vs. PSS Sleman (Indosiar) 18:30 Bhayangkara FC vs Semen Padang 18: 30 Persebaya vs PSM Makassar (Postponed).

Premier League

The schedule for the English Premier League week 11 tonight will present many interesting actions. Manchester United, Arsenal, Liverpool and Chelsea will be competing. Manchester vs Manchester United | 19:30 WIB Arsenal vs Wolves | 22:00 WIB Aston Villa vs Liverpool | 22:00 WIB (TVRI) Brighton vs Norwich | 22:00 WIB Manchester City vs Southampton | 22:00 WIB Sheffield vs Burnley | 22:00 WIB West Ham vs Newcastle | 22:00 WIB Watford vs Chelsea | 00:30 WIB (Sunday morning).

The Spanish league

Three big clubs in La Liga, Barcelona, Real Madrid and Atletico Madrid, will both compete in the schedule for the 12th week tonight. Espanyol vs Valencia | 19:00 WIBevante vs Barcelona | 22:00 WIB Evilla vs Atletico Madrid | 00:30 WIB Real Madrid vs Real Betis | 3:00 a.m.

Italian league

Competition between Juventus and Inter Milan will take place again tonight. Both race when undergoing the schedule of the 11th week of Serie A. AS Roma vs Napoli | 21:00 WIBBologna vs Inter Milan | 00:00 WIBTorino vs Juventus | 02:45 WIB.
